folder: Morris Park Avenue & Matthews Avenue, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: Morris Park Avenue - Matthews Avenue
text:
Morris Park Avenue, adjoining, and east of the S. E. corner of Matthews Avenue. The first house is number 832.

June 22, 1940
P. L. Sperr

folder: Morris Park Avenue & Matthews Avenue, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: Morris Park Avenue - Matthews Avenue
text:
Morris Park Avenue, adjoining, and east of the S. E. corner of Matthews Avenue. The first house is number 832.

folder: Morris Park Avenue & Matthews Avenue, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: Morris Park Avenue - Matthews Avenue
text:
Morris Park Avenue, at, and adjoining the N. W. corner of Matthews Avenue. An old street, named Rose Street, once passed hard by the wall of the 1-story frame taxpayer.
June 22, 1940
P. L. Sperr

folder: Morris Park Avenue & Matthews Avenue, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: Morris Park Avenue - Matthews Avenue
text:
Morris Park Avenue, north side, east from Matthews Avenue to Delancey Place. In the foreground, near Mullins Avenue, is the Bronx Free Church.
June 22, 1940
P. L. Sperr
